title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
4 points maximum

2 points for each process / one point per category in the context of linking property to contribution

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
4 points maximum

· Reactant in photosynthesis or equation (H 2 O + CO 2 ↔ C 6 H 12 O 6 + O 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4925@

· Specific role of water in photosynthesis

· Product in respiration or equation (H 2 O + CO 2 ↔ C 6 H 12 O 6 + O 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4925@

· Specific role of water in respiration

· Oceanic carbon storage CO 2  + H 2 O↔ H 2 CO 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@430F@

· Role of hydrolysis in catabolism

· Solvent for carbon based metabolism

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum (only one activity may be scored)

*Did not score activity point for mention of these terms unless they were properly linked to an impact on the water cycle
